summary: Johan inherits the family farm. However, charming as the idea may be, even in the modern globalized world, running a farm is still a matter of hard work, pain, and hope.
cast: Vincent Rottiers|Anaïs Demoustier|Florence Loiret Caille|Aurore Clément|Michel Subor|Carlo Brandt|Théo Laborie|Hélier Cisterne|Yoann Blanc|Elodie Moreau|Carlos De Souza|Daniel Renaud|Fabien Dijois|Delphine Gros|Laurent Perez|Didier Pons|Frédéric Cyprien|Patrice Tepasso|Yuna Baudry|Philippe Skujac
title: L'hiver dernier
